item.description:
Great band Avenue Groove..No cover charge and a nice atmosphere. Last time we went we had 30 people. We have 12 people so far..

“ We always have a  fantastic time dancing with this great band!.  The band starts playing at 9:30.  Check them out on their website http://avenuegroove.com/.   Great dancing music like Michael Jackson, Earth Wind and Fire and more.....

We will try to reserve one of the areas to the right of the band.

 

At our last event featuring the same band we had approximately 31 member from our group attended this event and had a blast! don't stay home alone. So come  join us for a great time. Make new friends and visit with old friends and have fun.
item.name: Dance till you drop at Maple Tree Cafe!
